row.scheme: ;;;;;;;; FindNextNoteLower (d-MoveCursorRight) (let loop ((lowest (d-GetCursorNoteAsMidi)) (current 0)) (set! current (d-GetNoteAsMidi)) (if (or (zero? current) (>= current lowest)) (begin (if (d-MoveCursorRight) (loop lowest current) #t))))
row._tooltip: Moves cursor to next note that is lower than the cursor.
